name: Sarah E. SMITH, Petitioner v. "Judge" Joy Reynolds McCOY, Respondent

parties: Sarah E. SMITH, Petitioner v. “Judge” Joy Reynolds McCOY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Quo Warranto and the Application for Appointment of Counsel are DENIED. The Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
128 A.3d 1199
Sarah E. SMITH, Petitioner v. “Judge” Joy Reynolds McCOY, Respondent.
No. 171 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 21, 2015.
